```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(p8105.datasets)
data("weather_df")
```

Import weather data.

```{r}
ggp_weather_scatterplot = 
  weather_df |>
    ggplot(aes(x=tmin, y=tmax))+
    geom_point()

ggp_weather_scatterplot
```

Which ones are missing?

```{r}
weather_df |>
  filter(is.na(tmax))
```
